nodes.text: One That Got Away is a short story by Grant S. Boucher originally published in the Galaxy Guide 1: A New Hope. It was also included in The Movie Trilogy Sourcebook.
Bounty hunter Jodo Kast's personal account of his failed attempt to capture Dr. Cornelius Evazan in a small city in the Corellian system, and how Evazan and Ponda Baba first met.
